articles.author: Jessica Hamzelou
articles.title: New coronavirus may be much more contagious than initially thought
articles.description: The new coronavirus is spreading faster than SARS - and it may be because it can be passed on before a person shows any sign of symptoms

articles.title: Fast action will be key to containing new coronavirus from China
articles.description: As the new virus that emerged in China spreads rapidly around the world, the reaction of national and international health agencies will be key to stopping it
articles.content:
STR/AFP via Getty
A DEADLY new virus is spreading rapidly around the world. In a matter of weeks, we have seen almost 3000 people infected across at least 12 countries, and more than 80 deaths. But epidemiologists are warning that it has the potential to spr… [+1974 chars]

articles.author: Debora MacKenzie
articles.title: New coronavirus looks set to cause a pandemic – how do we control it?
articles.description: The new coronavirus looks set to go global as case numbers rise, but the variable way it seems to be spreading offers hope for keeping it under control
articles.content:
By Debora MacKenzie
The new coronavirus, as imaged by an electron microscope
Zhu et al/NEJM © 2020, Massachusetts Medical Society
